name: Traship (TurtleFlyte)
description:
Clean up trash from the sea with your trusty trash plow Collect trash to upgrade your collector

There are only three upgrades whose progress is shown by the bar at the top.

Use WASD or arrows to control the ship.

Please lmk if there are any problems with the builds. Its too performance intensive for webgl lol.

Music by Final Gate Studios: https://finalgatestudios.itch.io/music-pack-1

Font is Sugar Snow by Khurasan: https://www.dafont.com/sugar-snow.font?text=1234567890
